document.full_text: havard bokko of norway upset defending champion shani davis of the united states to win the 1,500-meter title at the single-distance speedskating world championship.
document.title: bokko upsets shani davis to win 1,500 world title
lines_and_colors: havard bokko of norway upset defending champion shani davis of the united states to win the 1,500-meter title at the single-distance speedskating world championship.
